DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the predefined types of a door element from which the type required may be set.

DocAttribute.Name: OperationType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Type defining the general layout and operation of the door type in terms of the partitioning of panels and panel operations.

DocAttribute.Name: ParameterTakesPrecedence
DocAttribute.Documentation: The Boolean value reflects, whether the parameter given in the attached lining and panel properties exactly define the geometry (TRUE), or whether the attached style shape take precedence (FALSE). In the last case the parameter have only informative value. If not provided, no such information can be infered.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedOperationType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Designator for the user defined operation type, shall only be provided, if the value of _OperationType_ is set to USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The inherited attribute _ElementType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
